row.name: JOBP.FOREACH.TECHNICAL_FLOW.SAT_SRV_INGE.ADD
row.description: Process a request with N BDDs

row.process:
!:put_var VARA.TECHNICAL_FLOW.VM.1, "1", "Mercury", "Venus", "Earth", "Mars", "Jupiter" !:put_var VARA.TECHNICAL_FLOW.VM.1, "2", "Mercury", "Venus", "Earth", "Mars", "Jupiter"
!:delete_var VARA.TECHNICAL_FLOW.SGDB.1 !:delete_var VARA.TECHNICAL_FLOW.SGDB.2
:set &SGDB_NUMBER#=0
!:include JOBI.JASON_FILE.ARRAY !:FILL &STRINGS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&TEXT01#,",")
!:SET &VAR# = 1 !:SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&STRINGS#[]) !:set &KEY# = "1"
!:WHILE &VAR# LT &LEN# !:IF &STRINGS#[&VAR#] = "" !: SET &VAR# = &LEN# !:ELSE !: if str_find(&STRINGS#[&VAR#],"virtualMachine") > 0 !: set &VM_NUMBER#= &VM_NUMBER# + 1 !: endif !: if str_find(&STRINGS#[&VAR#],"id=") > 0 !: set &ID# = &STRINGS#[&VAR#] !: endif !: if str_find(&STRINGS#[&VAR#],"status=") > 0 !: set &STATUS# = &STRINGS#[&VAR#] !: endif !: if str_find(&STRINGS#[&VAR#],"os=") > 0 !: set &OS# = &STRINGS#[&VAR#] !: endif !: if str_find(&STRINGS#[&VAR#],"description=") > 0 !: set &DESC# = &STRINGS#[&VAR#] !: endif !: if str_find(&STRINGS#[&VAR#],"sla=") > 0 !: set &SLA# = &STRINGS#[&VAR#] !: if &VM_NUMBER# > 0 !: put_var VARA.TECHNICAL_FLOW.VM.1,&VM_NUMBER#,&ID#,&STATUS#,&DESC#,&OS#,&SLA# !: endif !: endif !: if str_find(&STRINGS#[&VAR#],"vpu=") > 0 !: set &VPU# = &STRINGS#[&VAR#] !: endif !: if str_find(&STRINGS#[&VAR#],"VMemory=") > 0 !: set &VMEMORY# = &STRINGS#[&VAR#] !: endif !: if str_find(&STRINGS#[&VAR#],"allocated=") > 0 !: set &VMEMORY_ALLOCATED# = &STRINGS#[&VAR#] !: if &VM_NUMBER# > 0 !: put_var VARA.TECHNICAL_FLOW.VM.2,&VM_NUMBER#,&VPU#,&VMEMORY#,&VMEMORY_ALLOCATED# !: endif !: endif !: set &VAR# = &VAR# + 1 !:endif !:ENDWHILE
